trans-unit.source: Constructor to create the context with the address of the authority.
trans-unit.target: Constructor to create the context with the address of the authority.

trans-unit.source: Using this constructor will enable validation of the authority URL by default if validation is supported for the authority address.
trans-unit.target: Using this constructor will enable validation of the authority URL by default if validation is supported for the authority address.

trans-unit.source: Address of the authority to issue token.
trans-unit.target: Address of the authority to issue token.

trans-unit.source: Constructor to create the context with the address of the authority and flag to disable address validation.
trans-unit.target: Constructor to create the context with the address of the authority and flag to disable address validation.

trans-unit.source: Address of the authority to issue token.
trans-unit.target: Address of the authority to issue token.

trans-unit.source: Flag to enable or disable address validation.
trans-unit.target: Flag to enable or disable address validation.

trans-unit.source: Using this constructor, address validation can be disabled.
trans-unit.target: Using this constructor, address validation can be disabled.

trans-unit.source: Before disabling address validation, ensure you are aware of the security implications of this change.
trans-unit.target: Before disabling address validation, ensure you are aware of the security implications of this change.

trans-unit.source: Constructor to create the context with the address of the authority and flag to disable address validation.
trans-unit.target: Constructor to create the context with the address of the authority and flag to disable address validation.

trans-unit.source: Using this constructor, address validation can be disabled.

trans-unit.source: Before disabling address validation, ensure you are aware of the security implications of this change.
trans-unit.target: Before disabling address validation, ensure you are aware of the security implications of this change.

trans-unit.source: Constructor to create the context with the address of the authority.
trans-unit.target: Constructor to create the context with the address of the authority.

trans-unit.source: This constructor enables authority validation by default if validation is supported by the address.
trans-unit.target: This constructor enables authority validation by default if validation is supported by the address.
